data.title: Matthew Settle
data.text:
Born: 17-Sep-1969

Birthplace: Hickory, NC

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: White

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Band of Brothers

Wife: Naama Nativ (model, m. Jul-2006, sep. 2009, one daughter)

Daughter: Aven Angelica Settle (b. Mar-2009)
